Class Constants.MSWord

  • Enclosing class:

    public static final class Constants.MSWord
extends java.lang.Object
    Constants related to MS Word

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char DELIMITER_CAPTION
      separates the [figure|table]-number from the caption text Example:
      Figure 2a: Some caption text
      static char DELIMITER_LISTLEVEL
      separates individual list levels Example:
      1.
      static char IDENTIFIER_APPENDIX
      identifier for all paragraphs belonging to the appendix of a chapter
      static java.lang.String PATTERN_APPENDIX
      Pattern of the first appendix paragraph Note: This must contain exactly one group which matches the appendix number.
      static java.lang.String PATTERN_TITLE
      Pattern of the main title of the document Note: This must contain exactly one group which matches the chapter number.
      static java.lang.String[] STYLENAME_HEADING
      String which must be contained in the name of a style to consider it as a heading style i.e.
      static java.lang.String STYLENAME_TITLE
      The name of the style of the document title.
      static int WORDS_MAX_HEADING
      Maximum number of words in a paragraph to consider it a possible heading

      • PATTERN_TITLE

        @DomainSpecific
public static final java.lang.String PATTERN_TITLE
        Pattern of the main title of the document

        Note: This must contain exactly one group which matches the chapter number.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STYLENAME_HEADING

        @DomainSpecific
public static final java.lang.String[] STYLENAME_HEADING
        String which must be contained in the name of a style to consider it as a heading style

        i.e. Überschrift would match Überschrift 1

      • STYLENAME_TITLE

        @DomainSpecific
public static final java.lang.String STYLENAME_TITLE
        The name of the style of the document title.

        There must be n >= 1 subsequent paragraphs with this style attached, which (combined) constitute the title of this document.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WORDS_MAX_HEADING

        @DomainSpecific
public static final int WORDS_MAX_HEADING
        Maximum number of words in a paragraph to consider it a possible heading
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
